0P0000751W.TO.summary: The fundâs objective is to provide the opportunity for capital appreciation during the term of the Fund and to pay, on the Maturity Date, an amount per unit equal to the greatest of the following three values: (i) $10.00 (the net asset value per unit of each series on the start date of the Fund), (ii) the highest month-end series net asset value per unit during the period from the start date of the Fund until the Maturity Date of the Fund or (iii) the series net asset value per unit on the Maturity Date of the Fund (the âGuaranteed Valueâ).
0P0000751W.TO.manager_bio: Mr. Lalande joined Industrial-Alliance in 1996 and has been Portfolio Manager, Fixed Income since 1998. As Senior Manager, he also supervises the Industrial-Alliance portfolio management team. He holds a bachelor's degree in business administration from Laval University, is designated CFA and has over 17 years of experience in the securities industry. Mr. Lalande is a member of the Financial Analysts Association of Montreal, Quebec chapter and the Montreal Association of Bond Negotiators.
